targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{db="kv", type="block_cache_hit"}[1m])) by (job) / (sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{db="kv", type="block_cache_hit"}[1m])) by (job) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{db="kv", type="block_cache_miss"}[1m])) by (job))

sum(rate(tikv_engine_memtable_efficiency{db="kv", type="memtable_hit"}[1m])) by (job) / (sum(rate(tikv_engine_memtable_efficiency{db="kv", type="memtable_hit"}[1m])) by (job) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_memtable_efficiency{db="kv", type="memtable_miss"}[1m])) by (job))

sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{db="raft", type="block_cache_hit"}[1m])) by (job) / (sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{db="raft", type="block_cache_hit"}[1m])) by (job) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_cache_efficiency{db="raft", type="block_cache_miss"}[1m])) by (job))

sum(rate(tikv_engine_memtable_efficiency{db="raft", type="memtable_hit"}[1m])) by (job) / (sum(rate(tikv_engine_memtable_efficiency{db="raft", type="memtable_hit"}[1m])) by (job) + sum(rate(tikv_engine_memtable_efficiency{db="raft", type="memtable_miss"}[1m])) by (job))
